p: A. dracunculus is not a pharmacopeial species. The use of the species in medicine is based only on traditional medicine, but the plant has been a frequent subject of research in many centers around the world, especially in Iran. New findings on the biological activity of extracts from the herb, leaves, and essential oil of this species–proven by scientific research conducted over the last 10 years–are presented below.
